description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	In charge of recruitment: posting job, searching CV, select CV, and contact with candidate for pre-interview, arrange the interview, received interview form from the interviewer.
              
              -	Contact to the confirmed candidate: send CV format Artelia, guideline information, received, check and modify their CV with professional format.
              
              -	Sending welcoming letter to introduce new comer.
              
              -	Sending congratulation letter after finishing probation period
              
              -	Preparing document of new comer to present to the Client (letter of appointment, CV, diploma, certificate…)
              
              -	Follow up end of probation evaluation
              
              -	Drafting of labor contracts agreements, letter and others document
              
              -	HR induction training to all new comers (together with Quality Management and Safety Department),
              
              -	Organize Code of Ethic training, PA/DC training, safety training, PM training, …
              
              -	Following up and daily updating staff allocation
              
              -	Mobilization staff as requirement from projects to projects.
              
              -	Assistance in database System Follow up.
              
              -	Other tasks assigned by Director/ HR manager.
